pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Wednesday, January 26, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings

10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the virtual Cabinet retreat.

Closed to media

4:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Third floor foyer
West Block
Parliament Hill

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media wishing to cover the event must be accredited with the Parliamentary Press Gallery.
  • Journalists can dial in to listen and ask questions.
  • Participant dial-in numbers:
    Local: 613-954-9003
    Toll-free: 1-866-206-0153
    Pass code: 3096894#

Media appearances:

6:00 p.m. An interview with the Prime Minister on mental health and wellness will air on TSN.

9:30 p.m. An interview with the Prime Minister on mental health and wellness will air on RDS.
